User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; fr; rv:1.9.2.14) Gecko/20110221 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.14

In the Join Mozilla program page, there is no mention of the program being annual. 

People must be informed of this.

Reproducible: Always
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; fr; rv:1.9.2.14) Gecko/20110221 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.14

In the Join Mozilla program page, there is no mention of the program being annual. 

People must be informed of this.

comments.raw_text: Participants will get an annual renewal notice where they can opt in again.
comments.creator: cnovak@mozilla.com
comments.text: Participants will get an annual renewal notice where they can opt in again.
comments.author: cnovak@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text: They should still know that such a renewal is coming instead of an email saying they're about to no longer be a joiner/supporter/contributor/member/insert-another-name-here-when-you-choose-one.
comments.text: They should still know that such a renewal is coming instead of an email saying they're about to no longer be a joiner/supporter/contributor/member/insert-another-name-here-when-you-choose-one.
comments.creator: samuel.sidler@gmail.com
comments.author: samuel.sidler@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: Fair point. Just need to think about where it would fit in best and how to get it into all the l10n strings.
comments.creator: cnovak@mozilla.com
comments.text: Fair point. Just need to think about where it would fit in best and how to get it into all the l10n strings.
comments.author: cnovak@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
Okay, the legal notice has been updated with this: 

"By clicking 'Process Contribution' you will be registered as an annual Mozilla Supporter."

I think we can do better at communicating the annual bit and will do so in the next iteration.
comments.creator: cnovak@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Okay, the legal notice has been updated with this: 

"By clicking 'Process Contribution' you will be registered as an annual Mozilla Supporter."

I think we can do better at communicating the annual bit and will do so in the next iteration.
comments.author: cnovak@mozilla.com
